description: Delilah seated in chair at center, with sleeping Samson seated, sleeping, on floor in front of her, with knees drawn up and his PL arm over her PL leg; Delilah is preparing to cut Samson's hair curly hair with a large scissors; soldiers with weapons on poles in doorway, ULQ

title: Samson and Delilah
